text: The 1956 European Cup Final was the final in the European Cup, now known as the UEFA Champions League. ==Route to the final== Real Madrid Real Madrid Real Madrid Real Madrid Round Reims Reims Reims Reims Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg Opponent Agg. 1st leg 2nd leg Servette 7–0 2–0 (A) 5–0 (H) First round AGF Aarhus 4–2 2–0 (A) 2–2 (H) Partizan 4–3 4–0 (H) 0–3 (A) Quarter-finals Vörös Lobogó 8–6 4–2 (H) 4–4 (A) Milan 5–4 4–2 (H) 1–2 (A) Semi-finals Hibernian 3–0 2–0 (H) 1–0 (A) ==Match== ===Details=== {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Juan Alonso RB 2 Ángel Atienza LB 3 Rafael Lesmes RH 4 Miguel Muñoz (c) CH 5 Marquitos LH 6 José María Zárraga OR 7 Joseíto IR 8 Ramón Marsal CF 9 Alfredo Di Stéfano IL 10 Héctor Rial OL 11 Francisco Gento Manager: Manager: Manager: José Villalonga José Villalonga José Villalonga José Villalonga Assistant referees: J.
